instructions:
Cut pork into large cubes then toss with 1 tbsp salt and let sit for 1 hr. Broil and peel peppers. Toss tomatillos and garlic with oil and salt then broil until soft. Blend peppers, tomatillos, garlic, and cilantro and season.

Cook pork and onions in a dutch oven. Add sauce, cumin, and stock and bring to a boil. Cook covered in a 275 oven for 3 hours. Season until tasty af.
name: Pork Chile Verde
